title: Bobby Talked to A Sleep Doctor and Shares Tips + The Random Texter Firefighter Sent Phone Screener Abby Gifts… + Morgan Evans on Celebrating Wedding Anniversary with Kelsea Ballerini
itunes:title: Bobby Talked to A Sleep Doctor and Shares Tips + The Random Texter Firefighter Sent Phone Screener Abby Gifts… + Morgan Evans on Celebrating Wedding Anniversary with Kelsea Ballerini
description:
Bobby shares that he recently met with a sleep doctor to find out what’s going on with him. Bobby shares what the doctor recommended and tips for falling asleep. We found out from a source that the firefighter who randomly texted our Phone Screener Abby has now sent her gifts. Bobby wants to know if they’ve still been talking and what Abby should do moving forward. Amy chats with Morgan Evans about Christmas music and his wedding anniversary to Kelsea Ballerini. Lunchbox goes out to random businesses and sings Christmas carols to people.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
